game.name: My Slime Mixer
game.description:
It is always exciting and relaxing to play with slime for anyone. Although it is true that it might be a lit bit of messy, the fun and joy you will get when you run your fingers through this glittery, colorful and jelly type of dough are unmatchable. It is up to you whether you purchase it through the store or join My Slime Mixer and get a chance to prepare it on your won. In this brand new cooking game for girls, you will be able to learn how to create a perfect slime recipe. 

Explore the best kitchen game and learn the easiest way to prepare the tasty slime! Make sure that you follow all the instructions step-by-step to achieve the goal of this free online cooking game. Start this game with measuring the ingredients and then stirring them into a bowl one-by-one. Do not forget to add the right food coloring to the glue concoction available in different hues and mix it properly. You can also find out the glitter in different shapes and colors. Sprinkle it over the mixture in your favorite color and shape!

Focus on what it is displaying on the screen and just keep following the instructions to ensure the perfect result. After preparing your recipe, feel free to enjoy it alone or with your friends. Yes, you can try it in your real kitchen and surprise the tasting buds of your family and friends with this scrumptious slime recipe. Check all the availability of all the ingredients in advance before trying it out. Play this cool HTML5 game in your favorite browser and have a lot of fun!
